TopicTitle: WANTED: A Piano/keyboard player willing to help with a video.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I want to make a new video celebrating the addition of Valentina to the crew and I think I found the perfect song, but I can't find a good lyric-free(and free-use) arrangement for it.

So if anyone could record or digitally create a simple backing track to it I would be grateful!

The song is

An abridged/simpler version would be easier if possible, like this parody did for skyrim.

Thanks in advance!

Edited May 2, 2015 by Xacktar
